Book Your Room Now!!Simple Introduction of ChinaChina, officially the People's Republic of China (PRC), is a sovereign state located in East Asia. It is the world's most populous country, with a population of over 1.35 billion. Covering approximately 9.6 million square kilometres, China is the world's second-largest country by land area.TOP Tourist Attractions of China1. Great Wall of China2. Forbidden City in Beijing3. Terracotta Army4. Pudong Skyline in Shanghai5. Mogao Caves in Dunhuang6. Leshan Giant Buddha in Sichuan7. Mount Huang/ Huangshan/ Yellow Mountain8. Li River Cruise from Guilin to Yangshuo9. Potala Palace in Lhasa Valley, Tibet10. Changbai Mountains11. Grand Canal of China12. Mount Tianzhu in Anhui13. Mount Jiuhua in Anhui14. Temple of Heaven in Beijing15. Xiamen in Fujian16. Wudang Mountains in Hubei17. Mount Tai in Shandong18. The Hanging Temple at Mount Heng, Shanxi19. Mount Emei, Sichuan20. Old Yalu Bridge, Dandong, Liaoning21. Yabuli Ski Resort in Heilongjiang
